text: Kofta Wash the bottle gourd.  Grate the gourd. Use the grater which has the smallest holes to make thin pieces or the bottle gourd. Assemble salt, self-rising flour, gram-flour and bread crumbs.  Add in bottle-gourd and mix well. Let stand for 15 minutes. Make balls and deep fry them in oil till almost golden brown.  Keep the Kofta aside.  Gravy Heat oil in pan.  Add the salt and onions. Sauté until it turns brown. Add garlic with ginger. Sauté another 2 minutes. Add: Turmeric powder Cumin Powder Coriander powder: ½ Tablespoon Fenugreek seed powder: ¼ teaspoon Cayenne pepper: ¼ teaspoon Stir fry so the spices do not burn for about 3 minutes.  Add: Tomato Puree Nutmeg powder Cinnamon powder Dried Fenugreek leaves Simmer for about 15 minutes.  Add water, and bring to a boil. Add water, pepper or salt to suit your taste. Serve Add Kofta and cilantro. Simmer for 5 minutes. Serve hot!
